user_bio: With 30+ years in IT and 20+ years in leadership, I specialize in no-code automation with n8n, optimizing workflows and integrating systems efficiently. As an Agile Coach and Project Manager, I’ve led teams, managed R&D, and driven IT transformations. Skilled in n8n, Java, Node.js, and cloud solutions, I help businesses streamline operations. Let’s connect if you need an n8n expert for automation!
